claim_text: The digital platform connecting founders, SMEs, and operators. Run pilots, solve technical problems, and deploy fast.
Real operational problems identified by mission owners
Founders and operators matched at The Combine
Our national security demands better technology, faster.
Operators face accelerating threats. Founders struggle to access real problems. Traditional acquisition moves slowly, trapped by legacy overhead and siloed processes.
Innovation must happen next to the mission — not behind a desk.
Merge creates a new model: A rapid, informed, operator-driven cycle where real problems translate into real prototypes and real deployments.
One week, in person. Funded and emerging teams get real validation from operators and mission owners close to the requirement.
Pressure-test solution fit with direct operator feedback
Leave with decisions, next steps, and champions
We co-found and build ventures born from validated problem sets—backed by operators, technical builders, and deployment partners.
The platform where builders and mission owners execute: briefs, problems, champions, and access paths to pilots.
Problem sets, champions, and builders in one workflow
Briefs (de-attributed) to reduce information overload
Guild listings for vetted teams (private beta)
Deep regional expertise and established operator relationships.
Weeks to deployment, not months or years.
Direct insights from mission owners and operators.
Navigate commercial and defense markets seamlessly.
Every venture starts with real, operator-validated needs.

For the government market, I have never seen this level of interactivity with incoming systems entrepreneurs. I absolutely believe this format delivered significant value to the warfighter beyond what we normally see.
This is what happens when you get entrepreneurs in one room, hungry for contracts and sick of bureaucracy.
SigmaBlox prepared us to pitch in crucible and xTech igniter environments. I hope to be competing against each of you.
Validate problems, join the Combine, or explore venture formation with Merge Studio.

Join Merge Combinator and become part of the next wave of national security innovation.
Merge Combinator is the builder-led venture studio for national security. If you're building for the Indo-Pacific mission, build with us.
The Combine: Validating Critical Problems and Solutions
Where founders, operators, and mission owners solve real problems and form teams. The best week in defense tech for early-stage founders.

Your gateway to the defense tech community. This is not an application to an incubator—it's access to a members-only portal where you can connect, learn, and find opportunities.

claim_text: The Combine compresses months of discovery into five days of focused validation with the people who own the problem.
The Combine is for teams with real technology and real traction. Leave your slide deck at home.
Funded or revenue-backed teams with a working product
Emerging tech aligned to Indo-Pacific problem sets
Founders and builders ready to commit to one week, in person.
Teams ready for direct, unfiltered operator feedback
Not funded or ready yet? Join Defense Builders to meet fellow builders and validate problems with end users.
Every team leaves with clear signal — validation, introductions, and a defined next step.
